short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces existing Netflix tab with a new one if a second Netflix page is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix doesn't allow play multiple videos in same time. This extension always keeps your browser playing the latest video you wish to play.
